title: Current account balance +$70 billion from table

content.description: Assume Country X has the following international transactions, in billions of dollars, during a given period of time.
content.question: What is the balance on the current account, in billions of dollars, for the period?

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model using quantitative data or calculations.
